UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public and private profile data.

uid.description: The unique ID of the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

avatar_url.description: URL for the user's profile picture.

banner_url.description: URL for the user's profile banner image.

role.description: The roles of the user within the application.

accountType.description: The type of account, which determines their platform access.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

isPremium.description: Indicates if the user has a premium subscription.

aiUsage.description: Tracks the user's monthly AI feature usage.

textCount.description: Number of text-based AI generations this month.

imageCount.description: Number of image-based AI generations this month.

searchCount.description: Number of web searches performed this month.

lastReset.description: Timestamp of the last time usage counts were reset.

businessProfile.description: Additional profile information for business accounts.

AdCampaign.title: Ad Campaign
AdCampaign.description: Represents an advertising campaign created by a business user.

advertiserId.description: The UID of the business user who created the campaign.

status.description: The current status of the campaign.

budget.description: Total budget for the campaign in INR.

placements.description: Where the ads for this campaign will be shown.

endDate.description: Optional end date for the campaign.

AdCreative.title: Ad Creative
AdCreative.description: Represents the actual visual content of an ad.

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign this creative belongs to.

mediaUrl.description: URL of the ad's image or video.

headline.description: The main headline for the ad.

body.description: The body text for the ad.

callToActionUrl.description: The URL the user is taken to upon clicking the ad.

admin.description: Grants administrative privileges across the application.

/adCampaigns/{campaignId}/creatives/{cre.description: Stores the ad creatives for a specific campaign.
